1: חָ֭כְמוֹת <sup>2454 </sup> <n>Wisdom</n> בָּנְתָ֣ה <sup>1129 </sup> <n>hath builded</n> בֵיתָ֑הּ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>her house</n> חָצְבָ֖ה <sup>2672 </sup> <n>she hath hewn out</n> עַמּוּדֶ֣יהָ <sup>5982 </sup> <n>pillars</n> שִׁבְעָֽה׃ <sup>7651 </sup> <n>her seven</n>
2: טָבְחָ֣ה <sup>2873 </sup> <n>She hath killed</n> טִ֭בְחָהּ <sup>2874 </sup> <n>her beasts</n> מָסְכָ֣ה <sup>4537 </sup> <n>she hath mingled</n> יֵינָ֑הּ <sup>3196 </sup> <n>her wine</n> אַ֝֗ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>has also</n> עָֽרְכָ֥ה <sup>6186 </sup> <n>she hath also furnished</n> שֻׁלְחָנָֽהּ׃ <sup>7979 </sup> <n>her table</n>
3: שָֽׁלְחָ֣ה <sup>7971 </sup> <n>She hath sent forth</n> נַעֲרֹתֶ֣יהָ <sup>5291 </sup> <n>her maidens</n> תִקְרָ֑א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>she crieth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>From</n> גַּ֝פֵּ֗י <sup>1610 </sup> <n>upon</n> מְרֹ֣מֵי <sup>4791 </sup> <n>the highest places</n> קָֽרֶת׃ <sup>7176 </sup> <n>of the city</n>
4: מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Whoever</n> פֶ֭תִי <sup>6612 </sup> <n>Whoso [is] simple</n> יָסֻ֣ר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>let him turn in</n> הֵ֑נָּה <sup>2008 </sup> <n>here</n> חֲסַר־ <sup>2638 </sup> <n>hither [as for] him that wanteth</n> לֵ֝֗ב <sup>3820 </sup> <n>understanding</n> אָ֣מְרָה <sup>559 </sup> <n>she saith</n> לּֽוֹ׃
5: לְ֭כוּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Come</n> לַחֲמ֣וּ <sup>3898 </sup> <n>eat</n> בְֽלַחֲמִ֑י <sup>3899 </sup> <n>of my bread</n> וּ֝שְׁת֗וּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drink</n> בְּיַ֣יִן <sup>3196 </sup> <n>of the wine</n> מָסָֽכְתִּי׃ <sup>4537 </sup> <n>[which] I have mingled</n>
6: עִזְב֣וּ <sup>5800 </sup> <n>Forsake</n> פְתָאיִ֣ם <sup>6612 </sup> <n>the foolish</n> וִֽחְי֑וּ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>and live</n> וְ֝אִשְׁר֗וּ <sup>833 </sup> <n>and go</n> בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>in the way</n> בִּינָֽה׃ <sup>998 </sup> <n>of understanding</n>
7: יֹ֤סֵ֨ר ׀ <sup>3256 </sup> <n>He that reproveth</n> לֵ֗ץ <sup>3887 </sup> <n>a scorner</n> לֹקֵ֣חַֽ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>getteth</n> ל֣וֹ קָל֑וֹן <sup>7036 </sup> <n>to himself shame</n> וּמוֹכִ֖יחַ <sup>3198 </sup> <n>and he that rebuketh</n> לְרָשָׁ֣ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>a wicked</n> מוּמֽוֹ׃ <sup>3971 </sup> <n>[man getteth] himself a blot</n>
8: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תּ֣וֹכַח <sup>3198 </sup> <n>Reprove</n> לֵ֭ץ <sup>3887 </sup> <n>not a scorner</n> פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>or</n> יִשְׂנָאֶ֑ךָּ <sup>8130 </sup> <n>lest he hate</n> הוֹכַ֥ח <sup>3198 </sup> <n>thee rebuke</n> לְ֝חָכָ֗ם <sup>2450 </sup> <n>a wise man</n> וְיֶאֱהָבֶֽךָּ׃ <sup>157 </sup> <n>and he will love</n>
9: תֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Give</n> לְ֭חָכָם <sup>2450 </sup> <n>[instruction] to a wise</n> וְיֶחְכַּם־ <sup>2449 </sup> <n>[man] and he will be yet wiser</n> ע֑וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>will be still</n> הוֹדַ֥ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>teach</n> לְ֝צַדִּ֗יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>a just</n> וְי֣וֹסֶף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>[man] and he will increase</n> לֶֽקַח׃ <sup>3948 </sup> <n>in learning</n> פ
10: תְּחִלַּ֣ת <sup>8462 </sup> <n>[is] the beginning</n> חָ֭כְמָה <sup>2451 </sup> <n>of wisdom</n> יִרְאַ֣ת <sup>3374 </sup> <n>The fear</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> וְדַ֖עַת <sup>1847 </sup> <n>and the knowledge</n> קְדֹשִׁ֣ים <sup>6918 </sup> <n>of the holy</n> בִּינָֽה׃ <sup>998 </sup> <n>[is] understanding</n>
11: כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בִ֭י יִרְבּ֣וּ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>shall be multiplied</n> יָמֶ֑יךָ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>For by me thy days</n> וְיוֹסִ֥יפוּ <sup>3254 </sup> <n>shall be increased</n> לְּ֝ךָ֗ שְׁנ֣וֹת <sup>8141 </sup> <n>and the years</n> חַיִּֽים׃ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of thy life</n>
12: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> חָ֭כַמְתָּ <sup>2449 </sup> <n>If thou be wise</n> חָכַ֣מְתָּ <sup>2449 </sup> <n>thou shalt be wise</n> לָּ֑ךְ וְ֝לַ֗צְתָּ <sup>3887 </sup> <n>for thyself but [if] thou scornest</n> לְֽבַדְּךָ֥ <sup>905 </sup> <n>alone</n> תִשָּֽׂא׃ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>thou alone shalt bear</n>
13: אֵ֣שֶׁת <sup>802 </sup> <n>woman</n> כְּ֭סִילוּת <sup>3687 </sup> <n>A foolish</n> הֹֽמִיָּ֑ה <sup>1993 </sup> <n>[is] clamorous</n> פְּ֝תַיּ֗וּת <sup>6615 </sup> <n>[she is] simple</n> וּבַל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>and</n> יָ֥דְעָה <sup>3045 </sup> <n>knoweth</n> מָּֽה׃ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>nothing</n>
14: וְֽ֭יָשְׁבָה <sup>3427 </sup> <n>For she sitteth</n> לְפֶ֣תַח <sup>6607 </sup> <n>at the door</n> בֵּיתָ֑הּ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of her house</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> כִּ֝סֵּ֗א <sup>3678 </sup> <n>on a seat</n> מְרֹ֣מֵי <sup>4791 </sup> <n>in the high places</n> קָֽרֶת׃ <sup>7176 </sup> <n>of the city</n>
15: לִקְרֹ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>To call</n> לְעֹֽבְרֵי־ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>pass</n> דָ֑רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>Who</n> הַֽ֝מְיַשְּׁרִ֗ים <sup>3474 </sup> <n>who go right</n> אֹֽרְחוֹתָֽם׃ <sup>734 </sup> <n>on their ways</n>
16: מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Whoever</n> פֶ֭תִי <sup>6612 </sup> <n>Whoso [is] simple</n> יָסֻ֣ר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>let him turn in</n> הֵ֑נָּה <sup>2008 </sup> <n>here</n> וַחֲסַר־ <sup>2638 </sup> <n>hither and [as for] him that wanteth</n> לֵ֝֗ב <sup>3820 </sup> <n>understanding</n> וְאָ֣מְרָה <sup>559 </sup> <n>she saith</n> לּֽוֹ׃
17: מַֽיִם־ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waters</n> גְּנוּבִ֥ים <sup>1589 </sup> <n>Stolen</n> יִמְתָּ֑קוּ <sup>4985 </sup> <n>are sweet</n> וְלֶ֖חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>and bread</n> סְתָרִ֣ים <sup>5643 </sup> <n>[eaten] in secret</n> יִנְעָֽם׃ <sup>5276 </sup> <n>is pleasant</n>
18: וְֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יָ֭דַע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>But he knoweth</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> רְפָאִ֣ים <sup>7496 </sup> <n>not that the dead</n> שָׁ֑ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>are there</n> בְּעִמְקֵ֖י <sup>6012 </sup> <n>[are] in the depths</n> שְׁא֣וֹל <sup>7585 </sup> <n>of hell</n> קְרֻאֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>[are] there [and that] her guests</n> פ
